sense.gloss: safe, secure, sound, problem-free, without fear, all right, alright, OK, okay
no thanks, I'm good, that's alright
great man, fine figure of a man
x: 大丈夫・だいじょうふ

sense.gloss: married couple, husband and wife, man and wife
his and hers, pair of objects, one larger (for man), one smaller (for woman)
devising (a way), contriving, inventing, thinking up, figuring out, coming up with, working out
dedication to spiritual improvement (esp. through Zen meditation)

sdata.j: ↑大丈夫↑↓だいじょうぶ↓、↑出来↑↓でき↓ますよ。
2006↑年↑↓ねん↓↑上海↑↓しゃんはい↓では15↑万↑↓まん↓↑組↑↓くみ↓の↑夫婦↑↓ふうふ↓が↑結婚↑↓けっこん↓すると↑予想↑↓よそう↓されている。
sdata.e: One hundred and fifty thousand couples are expected to get married in Shanghai in 2006.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑漁夫↑↓ぎょふ↓の↑利↑↓り↓を↑占↑↓し↓めようとしているのか。
sdata.e: Are you trying to fish in troubled waters?

sdata.j: ↑隅↑↓すみ↓にいた↑男↑↓おとこ↓の↑人↑↓ひと↓が↑夫↑↓おっと↓に↑話↑↓はな↓しかけた。
sdata.e: The man in the corner addressed himself to the husband.

sdata.j: ↑強盗↑↓ごうとう↓は↑夫婦↑↓ふうふ↓を↑地下↑↓ちか↓↑室↑↓しつ↓にとじこめた。
sdata.e: The burglar locked the couple in the basement.

sdata.j: ↑漁夫↑↓ぎょふ↓の↑利↑↓り↓を↑占↑↓し↓める。
sdata.e: A third party makes off with the profits.

sdata.j: ↑漁夫↑↓ぎょふ↓の↑利↑↓り↓を↑占↑↓し↓めるつもりはない。
sdata.e: I have no intention of fishing in troubled waters.
Two dogs fight for a bone, and the third runs away with it.

sdata.j: ↑急↑↓いそ↓げば↑大丈夫↑↓だいじょうぶ↓です。
sdata.e: If we hurry, we'll make it.

sdata.j: ↑客人↑↓きゃくじん↓たちはその↑幸↑↓しあわ↓せな↑夫婦↑↓ふうふ↓が↑末永↑↓すえなが↓く↑裕福↑↓ゆうふく↓な↑人生↑↓じんせい↓を↑送↑↓おく↓る↑事↑↓こと↓を↑祈↑↓いの↓った。
sdata.e: The guests wished the happy couple a long and prosperous life.
